column5: Just saw this on another board and thought some here might be interested.  Les's Off the Grid is showing on OLN tonight at 8 p.m.  http://www.lesstroudonline.com/  Off The Grid with Les Stroud  Watch OLN in Canada this November 28th at 8 pm for Les's 90 minute special;  It follows Les and his family's trials of becoming a family dedicated to self sufficiency with a love for a life close to nature.  Unfortunately we have no air dates for the USA at this time but we will notify you as soon as we do.
i love watching his show he sure shows guts and determination ,to do what he does for 7 days at a time ,most if not all of us would die long before that,i will tune in for sure
Thanks a lot Nemo.  I will watch that.
Is this a new episode, cause I saw a program with him and his wife and child living off the land in a homemade cabin for a year.
Elly Mae asks what's wrong with livin' in a cabin?
Great show.  I get it on The Science Channel, #284 on DirecTV.
i think is the one that was on before , but maybe not
Looks like a new one to me, just started watching it.
Yep it's different than the first one. Different wife I think.
I aint that familiar with Les, lol.
Sorry I was wrong I think she is the same wife.
Would love to do the same and maybe in a few short years it'll be a reality. Kerry
Great show - wish I could live off the grid sometimes - get away from the city. 007
